content.question: A citizen who uses the rational choice model of voting behavior selects candidates for office based on

choices.label: what is thought to be in the citizen’s own self-interest
the label of the party running for office
predictions of how a candidate will perform in the future
the recent performance of the candidates running for office

content.answer: what is thought to be in the citizen’s own self-interest

topic.text: 5.1: Voting Rights and Models of Voting Behavior
